summary: Iteration 11 - Comprehensive testing of all fixed features. All backend APIs (21 tests) and frontend UI features passed. Global search, Calendar views, Team page, Public booking, Dashboard stats, and Onboarding all working correctly.
passed_tests: Global Search - Returns bookings, services, customers
Global Search - Short query returns empty results
Team Members - Get all team members
Team Members - Create new team member
Public Booking - Get public business info
Public Booking - Get public team members
Calendar - Day view with team member columns
Calendar - Week view with booking counts
Calendar - Month view with booking cards
Team Page - Branded delete dialog (NOT browser confirm)
Public Booking - Step 2 team member selection
Public Booking - Step 3 client details form
critical_code_review_comments: All features implemented correctly and working as expected
Global search properly searches across bookings, services, and customers
Calendar views (Day/Week/Month) all functional with proper data display
Team page has proper inline editing and branded delete dialog
Public booking page has complete 3-step flow with team member selection
seed_data_creation: Used existing seeded data (116 bookings, 6 team members, 6 services)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All iteration 11 features verified working: 1) Global search with ⌘K shortcut returns bookings, services, customers. 2) Calendar has Day/Week/Month views with team member columns in Day view. 3) Team page has inline editing and branded delete dialog (custom modal, not browser confirm). 4) Public booking page at /book/{businessId} has 3-step flow with team member selection. 5) Dashboard shows correct stats. 6) Onboarding endpoints work. Test credentials: testuser@example.com / password123. Business ID: 3edbbbc1-730a-494e-9626-1a0a5e6309ef

calendar_page.day_view: Team member columns with avatars and time grid
calendar_page.week_view: 7-day view with booking counts per day
calendar_page.month_view: Full month calendar with booking cards

team_page.inline_editing: Edit form expands inline with name, email, phone, role, color, services

elements: This action cannot be undone subtitle

public_booking_page.step_2_team_selection: Team members with avatars (Any available + individual members)
public_booking_page.step_2_time_slots: 15 time slots displayed when date selected
public_booking_page.step_3_client_details: Name, email, phone fields with booking summary
